channel.title: Hosting Issues
channel.description:
OK, so I have hosting issues at my own house. So my cousin offered to host our P server. OK, his operation system is Windows Vista Home Premium, Service Pack One, which i have no knowledge about(I have Xp). His router is a 2link(I have linksys). I have no idea what I'm doing... I've ran and hosted my own server. But can't understand his computer. If anyone can help by adding my Msn(samtherule@hotmail.com)... Skype(samtherule)... or Email(samtherule@gmail.com). I'll tell you the teamviewer stuff. Thanks -Sam ------------------------------------------------------- Edit I found the problem was with the client.
Please close this thread.

item.title: Hosting Issues
item.dc:creator: @samtherule samtherule
item.description:
@samtherule wrote:

OK, so I have hosting issues at my own house. So my cousin offered to host our P server. OK, his operation system is Windows Vista Home Premium, Service Pack One, which i have no knowledge about(I have Xp). His router is a 2link(I have linksys). If anyone can help by adding my Msn(samtherule@hotmail.com)… Skype(samtherule)… or Email(samtherule@gmail.com). I’ll tell you the teamviewer stuff.

Edit
I found the problem was with the client.

Please close this thread.
